name: VCIO Budget Summary
query:
SELECT
  (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(bl.amount), 0)
   FROM `tabVCIO Budget Line` bl
   JOIN `tabVCIO Budget` b ON b.name = bl.parent
   WHERE b.period = %(period)s AND b.status IN ("Draft", "Active")
  ) AS budget_total,
  (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.amount), 0)
   FROM `tabVCIO Actual Entry` a
   WHERE a.period = %(period)s
  ) AS actual_total,
  (
    (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(bl.amount), 0)
     FROM `tabVCIO Budget Line` bl
     JOIN `tabVCIO Budget` b ON b.name = bl.parent
     WHERE b.period = %(period)s AND b.status IN ("Draft", "Active")
    )
    -
    (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(a.amount), 0)
     FROM `tabVCIO Actual Entry` a
     WHERE a.period = %(period)s
    )
  ) AS variance_total,
  (SELECT COUNT(*)
   FROM `tabVCIO Budget Line` bl
   JOIN `tabVCIO Budget` b ON b.name = bl.parent
   WHERE b.period = %(period)s
     AND b.status IN ("Draft", "Active")
     AND bl.end_date IS NOT NULL
     AND bl.end_date <= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL %(days)s DAY)
  ) AS renewals_count
